name: Super dude guy
description:
gamepad recommended

•Movement: WD/Arrow keys/D-pad

•Jump: Space/W/Up(Arrow key)/A/B

•Run: LShift/Y/X

•Pause: ESC/Z/Start

Super dude guy is a simple platformer that isn't really based on anything. The biggest similarity would be to Super meat boy as it is equally as frustrating! It startet as "Let's make a platformer" and that's exactly what happened.

You take on the role of a little robot that needs to find the key for it's house while aliens try to kill it. And so you jump and run through the 8 levels trying not to destroy your controller in rage.

Please note that the speedrun timer is highly inacurate so if you want to know exactly how long you needed it wont be any good.

Also the key is always to the left (except for stage 6)

Have fun!
